docs.snippet: The threat of a fourth consecutive defeat is looming large for Manchester United and their manager David Moyes, yet the beleaguered Scot feels things are on the verge of turning for his struggling side....

headline.main: Moyes Banks on Better Luck in Swansea Sequel
headline.print_headline: Moyes Banks on Better Luck in Swansea Sequel

docs.lead_paragraph: The threat of a fourth consecutive defeat is looming large for Manchester United and their manager David Moyes, yet the beleaguered Scot feels things are on the verge of turning for his struggling side.

docs.snippet: Japan's health ministry filed a criminal complaint against Novartis AG's local unit on Thursday after the pharmaceuticals company promoted its best-selling blood pressure drug Diovan using manipulated data....

headline.main: Japan Ministry Files Criminal Complaint Against Novartis Over Diovan
headline.print_headline: Japan Ministry Files Criminal Complaint Against Novartis Over Diovan

docs.lead_paragraph: Japan's health ministry filed a criminal complaint against Novartis AG's local unit on Thursday after the pharmaceuticals company promoted its best-selling blood pressure drug Diovan using manipulated data.

docs.snippet: Odyssey Sims scored a career-high 48 points and set a Baylor record for career 3-pointers in the seventh-ranked Bears' 78-62 victory over West Virginia on Wednesday night....

headline.main: Sims Has 48 Points, Baylor Women Top W. Virginia
headline.print_headline: Sims Has 48 Points, Baylor Women Top W. Virginia

docs.lead_paragraph: Odyssey Sims scored a career-high 48 points and set a Baylor record for career 3-pointers in the seventh-ranked Bears' 78-62 victory over West Virginia on Wednesday night.

docs.snippet: Apple Inc and Samsung Electronics have agreed to attend a mediation session to be held on or before February 19, as they prepare to clash in court in March over smartphone patents....

headline.main: Apple, Samsung CEOs Agree to Mediation in U.S. Patent Fight
headline.print_headline: Apple, Samsung CEOs Agree to Mediation in U.S. Patent Fight

docs.lead_paragraph: Apple Inc and Samsung Electronics have agreed to attend a mediation session to be held on or before February 19, as they prepare to clash in court in March over smartphone patents.

docs.snippet: Craig Biggio barely came up short, so he'll be back next year. Jack Morris' outing is over, and he went the distance again....

headline.print_headline: Biggio Barely Misses Cut, Morris Left Out of Hall

docs.lead_paragraph: Craig Biggio barely came up short, so he'll be back next year. Jack Morris' outing is over, and he went the distance again.

docs.snippet: Novartis Pharmaceuticals Corp. paid kickbacks to a specialty pharmacy in exchange for recommending refills of a blood transfusion drug it produces, according to an amended complaint filed Wednesday in a civil case brought by state and federal pros...

headline.main: Authorities in NY Sue Novartis in Kickback Scheme
headline.print_headline: Authorities in NY Sue Novartis in Kickback Scheme

docs.lead_paragraph: Novartis Pharmaceuticals Corp. paid kickbacks to a specialty pharmacy in exchange for recommending refills of a blood transfusion drug it produces, according to an amended complaint filed Wednesday in a civil case brought by state and federal prosecutors in New York.

docs.snippet: In cities including Washington, D.C., overseas voting on a draft of a new Egyptian constitution began on Wednesday, with voters lining up at Egyptian embassies and consulates around the world to cast ballots they hope will shape the future of Egyp...
docs.lead_paragraph: In cities including Washington, D.C., overseas voting on a draft of a new Egyptian constitution began on Wednesday, with voters lining up at Egyptian embassies and consulates around the world to cast ballots they hope will shape the future of Egypt. docs.snippet: Hundreds of thousands of Filipino Catholics began a raucous religious procession in Manila Thursday to honor a centuries-old black statue of Jesus Christ in an annual event that organizers say was being held partly to pray for the victims of a mon...

headline.main: Filipinos Jam Capital for Huge Catholic Parade
headline.print_headline: Filipinos Jam Capital for Huge Catholic Parade

docs.lead_paragraph: Hundreds of thousands of Filipino Catholics began a raucous religious procession in Manila Thursday to honor a centuries-old black statue of Jesus Christ in an annual event that organizers say was being held partly to pray for the victims of a monster typhoon that devastated the central Philippines last year.
